AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubbleQuadandTibCore" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubbleQuadandTibCore") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubbleQuad" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubbleQuad") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubbleTibCore" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubbleTibCore") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Rubble" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoRubble" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoRubble") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedQuadandTibCore" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedQuadandTibCore") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedTibCore" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedTibCore") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedQuad" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamagedQuad") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_ReallyDamaged" and Prev ~= "TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IntoReallyDamaged") end
